meanings.definition: To give a pleasant smell to something.
meanings.sent1: I will aromatize the room with a scented candle.
meanings.sent2: She likes to aromatize her laundry with lavender oil.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to aromatize the kitchen with the aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed to aromatize the entire neighborhood with their sweet scent.
meanings.sent5: The air freshener was designed to aromatize the car quickly and effectively.

meanings.definition: To add a fragrance or aroma to something.
meanings.sent1: They will aromatize the soap with a hint of jasmine.
meanings.sent2: The chef chose to aromatize the dish with a touch of herbs.
meanings.sent3: The perfume company decided to aromatize their latest product with a unique blend of scents.
meanings.sent4: The bakery seemed to aromatize the entire street with the smell of freshly baked pastries.
meanings.sent5: The scented candles were used to aromatize the room and create a cozy atmosphere.
